application.algorithms.cblof.CblofConfiguration module

class application.algorithms.cblof.CblofConfiguration.CblofConfiguration(data_file: str = 'multi-dataset.csv', model_name: str = 'model.pkl', report_file: str = 'report.csv', seed: int = 42, n_clusters: int = 100, contamination: float = 0.1, alpha: float = 0.9, beta: float = 5, use_weights: bool = False, check_estimator: bool = False)[source]

Bases: AlgorithmConfigurator

Configuration class for the CBLOF algorithm.

n_clusters

Number of clusters to form. Defaults to 100.

Type:

int

contamination

The amount of contamination of the data set, i.e., the proportion of outliers in the data set. Defaults to 0.1.

Type:

float

clustering_estimator

The base clustering algorithm to use. Defaults to None.

alpha

Weight factor for small clusters. Defaults to 0.9.

Type:

float

beta

Weight factor for large clusters. Defaults to 5.

Type:

float

use_weights

Whether to use weights for the clusters. Defaults to False.

Type:

bool

check_estimator

Whether to check the estimator’s parameters. Defaults to False.

Type:

bool

alpha: float = 0.9
beta: float = 5
check_estimator: bool = False
clustering_estimator = None
contamination: float = 0.1
n_clusters: int = 100
use_weights: bool = False
